files.patch:
@@ -579,1 +579,1 @@
-    LANGSTD_CXXFLAGS="-std=c++14"
+    LANGSTD_CXXFLAGS="-std=c++17"
@@ -581,1 +581,1 @@
-    LANGSTD_CXXFLAGS="-std:c++14"
+    LANGSTD_CXXFLAGS="-std:c++17"
@@ -583,1 +583,1 @@
-    AC_MSG_ERROR([Don't know how to enable C++14 for this toolchain])
+    AC_MSG_ERROR([Don't know how to enable C++17 for this toolchain])
